articles.title: "In 4 Years, You Won't Have To Vote Again," Donald Trump Tells Christians - NDTV
articles.description: Republican nominee Donald Trump has told Christians that if they vote for him in the November presidential elections, he will fix everything so well that they won't have to vote again.
